data.message: Hello! I am highly frustrated that Messenger doesn't work on my newly bought Acer I-pad device. And after reinstallements it still doesn't work!!!

replies.message: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Linda. Please report it to us by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2g06Y7F. -Joe

I have already reported it to you on Facebook four times! How many times shall I do it until I get real instructions how to deal with this, Joe?
I hope you understand that this is not personal, to you. 
/ Linda.

Your own app are crap! It stops itself after I have installed it gain, and again,and again! You must take us customers for fools.Beacuse of your own crappy app, Messenger still doesn't work. 
Give me a good reason why I should continue to use Facebook?
